Hi: is there a folder like program files in windows in ubuntu where i can see which software was installed, update to 12 lts broke my system "no filessystem could mount root", i can access the old partitions via ubuntu live cd and want to note down my installed programs for new 12 lts clean install. Anyone has a tip to get that list?
you chroot into the old filesystem from the live usb, then use the dpkg --get-selections to list all the installed applications.
